meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Scott Schneider Linda Eaton Ella Rich Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4053.

td.p: Scott Schneider, a high school teacher from Louisville, Kentucky
Linda Eaton, a training consultant from Clarence, New York
Ella Rich, a freelance translator originally from Springfield, Missouri (whose 1-day cash winnings total $6,801)

tr.td: THE SON ALSO RISES
FORMAL COUNTRY DESIGNATIONS
DISEASES
'90s MUSIC
A BARTENDERS' GUIDE
ENDS IN "A"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Ella.] Who is Morgan?)
(Ella: Morgan is my 10-month-old daughter.)
(Alex: All right. She got a mention, and you can save the day.)

---
(Alex: The reference was to the 1927 Yankees. They had such great batters that they were called [*].
LindaWhat is The Black Sox?
$7,000
EllaWhat is Morgan?
$4,900
ScottWhat is The Gashouse Gang?
$2,100
Murderer\'s Row')

Linda
Scott

(including 1 DD),
